casebody.data:
HUDGINS FISH CO., INC., a Florida Corporation v. VERNON THOMPSON, SR., and HUDGINS FISH CO., INC., a Florida Corporation, v. VERNON THOMPSON, JR., an infant, by VERNON THOMPSON, SR., as his father and next friend. 34 So. (2nd) 572 March 23, 1948

January Term, 1948

Division A

Affirmed.
